ComicInfo.Summary:
Christmas will never be the same again as Die Hard meets Jurassic Park. A criminal heist! A mysterious Vietnam vet resurfaces in the world! Strange creatures from around the globe descend on a small American town. A fluid bomb of events leading to slaughter, and a couple of courageous officers fight to help save their town!
Christmas will never be the same again as "Die Hard" meets "Jurassic Park" in the adventure of a lifetime by screenwriter Brendan Columbus and artist Al Barrionuevo (Batman: Detective Comics)
